about.p1: I am a smart, well-educated, and energetic IT professional, widely known for my honesty, discipline, and organized behavior. Originally from {dhaka}, I've had the opportunity to study at renowned universities in {universities}.
about.p2: I am a {usCitizen}, professionally and financially well-established in both the {countries}, with properties and homes in both countries. Currently, I work as a {jobTitle}. In addition, I founded and manage a {companyType}. I am also actively exploring {realEstate}.
about.p3: I lead a {lifestyle}, free from smoking or alcohol.
about.highlight: I have a deep love for children and believe they bring immense joy and strengthen the bond in a marriage. I hope my future partner shares my passion for building a happy, family-oriented life soon after marriage.
about.universities: Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the United States
about.jobTitle: Software Engineer on a U.S. Federal Government project
about.realEstate: real estate investment opportunities in the U.S.

values.health: Excellent; no health issues or disabilities

family.motherValue: Homemaker; resides in both the USA and Dhaka
family.elderBrotherValue: Medical Doctor from Dhaka Medical College; currently working with the World Health Organization (WHO)
family.elderSisterValue: Associate Professor of Physics at a government college in Dhaka
family.youngerBrotherValue: BUET graduate; Master's from LSBU (UK) and Texas Tech University (USA) | Former employee at Google, currently working with the U.S. Federal Government, residing in Texas
family.familyResidencesValue: Dhaka (Bangladesh), Washington D.C., Maryland, and Texas (USA)

education.currentRoleValue: IT Professional with the U.S. Federal Government

assets.property1: Five-storied house in Pallabi, Mirpur (near Metro Station)
assets.property4: 7-katha plot in Sagutta Housing (adjacent to Mirpur DOHS)
assets.property5: Three-storied single-family home on a 0.54-acre lot in Washington, D.C.

partner.careerValue: Career/job is not a priority; preference for someone with a homely, nurturing nature
partner.qualitiesValue: Polite, well-organized, homely, family-oriented, enjoys cooking, caring and loving toward family and children, respectful and supportive of her husband, and values traditional morals and ethics.
